text: Mazel tov. For the first time since human gummy bear Miley Cyrus and youngest Hemsworth, Liam, reunited earlier this year, The Voice coach has confirmed that they are, in fact, engaged again. Cyrus and Hemsworth first began dating in 2009 while shooting the film adaptation of Nicholas Sparks'teen love drama The Last Song. The pair became engaged in 2012 before calling off the engagement in 2013. After quietly resuming their relationship earlier this year, Cyrus raised a few eyebrows when she posted a photo to Instagram in which she's wearing her old engagement ring.
